name: Telephone Number
description: The TN data type is used to represent telephone numbers in a simple string format. It provides basic telephone number representation without the enhanced structure and telecommunications capabilities of the XTN data type. TN has been replaced by XTN as of HL7 v2.3 but is maintained for backward compatibility with older systems and simple telephone number requirements.
